did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Rosters, diary, journals, scrapbooks, logs, map, correspondence, programs, photographs, glass negatives, slides, videocassettes, and film.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes varsity and freshman crew ephemera and photographs.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: The Cornell Crew was also referred to as the Cornell Navy, or rowing team, but should not be called the crew team.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes varsity and freshman crew rosters; Coach Charles Courtney's diary and journals of distances rowed, weather conditions, and other information; newspaper clippings and other press; regatta programs; scrapbooks; map; correspondence with Todd Jesdale; minutes of the Sprague Boat Club; photographs, photograph albums, and glass negatives of crew events, Ithaca, New York views, and the Cayuga Lake Inlet; and a phonograph record and cassette copy concerning a 1946 regatta at Lake Washington. Material pertaining to John L. Collyer and Donald E. Maclay. Also, videocassettes and a film of the 1957 Cornell crew victory at Henley. Also, the crew logs (1937-1970) and crew files (1937-1975) of coach R. Harrison "Stork" Sanford; and slides of crews and crew activities. Also, scrapbooks (1896-1898). Also some film including footage of the 1929 Syracuse vs Cornell regatta by Allan H. Mogensen. 1957 Henley regatta materials.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Due to the fragility and potential degradation of moving image and sound recordings, viewing and listening is limited to items that have been digitized. If an item is in another media format, you may request to have the item digitized for access. Information on ordering access copies may be found on our Reproductions and Permissions page.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University Crew records, #40-1-924. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: See also Ernest William Schoder papers, #16-4-1156 for an additional film.
See also Arthur Charles Stallman papers, #2981 for a 1927 photo album featuring the crew.

arrangement.head: SERIES LIST
arrangement.p:
Series I. General files
Boxes 1, 8, 9, 11, 12, 15-18, 22, 23, 27, 28 and Mapcase Folder 6, 7

Series II. Audio and visual material
Box 7 and other individually located items

Series III. Photographs
Boxes 2-7, 10, 12-14, 18-26, Mapcase Folders 1-5 and 7

Series IV. Objects
Box 17 and loose items

scopecontent.p: Includes copy of the May 29, 1895 Cornell Daily Sun article about the send off the team received on its way to the Henley Regatta. Also a poem about the crew titled "Looking Backward".
